thread.title: Thousands of Amazon workers on strike during Black Friday, Cyber Monday | National | caledonianrecord.com
thread.title_full: Thousands of Amazon workers on strike during Black Friday, Cyber Monday | National | caledonianrecord.com

author: Thérèse Boudreaux | The Center Square
title: Thousands of Amazon workers on strike during Black Friday, Cyber Monday | National | caledonianrecord.com
text:
(The Center Square) – Thousands of Amazon workers in the U.S. and abroad are striking from Black Friday to Cyber Monday.
Workers have participated in the annual strike for five straight years as part of “Make Amazon Pay” movement.
